name: Satellite Aegis
description:
Earth is under siege by barrage of asteroids and spaceships... Our last hope is to construct a network of satellites that can take out the dangers before they impact the planet...

Gameplay

You've been tasked with the responsibility to use the Earth's last resources to place satellites in orbit around the planet. You have 5 different types to choose from, as well as the ability to add more orbits and heal the planet.

Controls

Clicking on various parts of the screen will provide the actions you can undertake;

  • Planet - Add an orbit, or recover health
  • Orbit - Controlling the rotational speed, and stop/start/reverse
  • Orbit Node - Selecting which satellite type to place on the node
  • Satellite - Upgrade or sell

Misc Notes

The game is playable, but not balanced especially well.
